prompt: I'm building a Godot 4 RPG. How do I implement a save/load system that can save player stats (health, level, position) and quest progress? The save should work on multiple platforms and support encryption.
assertions: The save system uses Godot 4 APIs (FileAccess, not the deprecated File class from Godot 3)
The implementation mentions or includes encryption support
The solution organizes saveable nodes with a consistent interface or pattern
The save data includes player stats like health, level, and position
